thread.title: Thomas Williams
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Thomas Williams

author: Thomas Williams
title: Thomas Williams
text:
It was as an easy process all the way through. The only hiccup was the frames I wanted were not in stock. That wasn't a big deal since I was in no hurry; if you must have instant gratification then you may want to check availability before ordering.
Otherwise, I would not hesitate to recommend Frames Direct and have already mentioned my experience to a couple of colleagues at work who liked my new frames.
